findings.rationale: The obligations to maintain confidentiality continue indefinitely, which can lead to unforeseen liabilities or constraints on future business opportunities.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: Indemnification without limit can expose a party to significant financial risk if breaches occur, as it covers all claims and damages.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit, arising out of any breach of this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limiting liability can protect parties from excessive claims; the absence of such limits can lead to substantial financial exposure.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The automatic assignment of rights to Company A may limit the other party's ability to use their own contributions, which may discourage collaboration.
findings.evidence_quote: The receiving party hereby assigns all right, title, and interest in such work product.

findings.rationale: The clause may create a deterrent for parties to pursue legitimate disputes if they fear bearing the other party's legal costs.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
